statements: SELECT * FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_id, dependency_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 2
SELECT dependency_id, project_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE dependency_id = 3
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies WHERE dependency_id = 4
SELECT project_id, dependency_id FROM project_dependencies
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies;
SELECT project_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE dependency_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 10 AND dependency_id = 20;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(dependency_id) AS num_dependencies FROM project_dependencies GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id, dependency_id FROM project_dependencies ORDER BY project_id DESC, dependency_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies;
SELECT project_id, dependent_project_id FROM project_dependencies ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, dependent_project_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_id, dependent_project_id FROM project_dependencies GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT MAX(project_id), COUNT(dependent_project_id) FROM project_dependencies;
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies ORDER BY dependent_project_id DESC
SELECT project_id, dependent_project_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE dependent_project_id > 5
SELECT task_description, task_order FROM task_sequences WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY task_order ASC
SELECT project_id, COUNT(dependent_project_id) AS num_dependencies FROM project_dependencies GROUP BY project_id HAVING num_dependencies > 2
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies;
SELECT project_id, dependent_project_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT path_name FROM critical_paths WHERE path_id = 3;
SELECT sequence_id, task_name FROM task_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_sequences WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies ORDER BY dependent_project_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, dependent_project_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT p.project_id, ts.task_name, cp.path_name FROM projects p JOIN task_sequences ts ON p.project_id = ts.project_id JOIN critical_paths cp ON ts.sequence_id = cp.sequence_id;
SELECT MAX(project_id) AS max_project_id FROM project_dependencies;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id FROM project_dependencies WHERE dependent_project_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Project WHERE end_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Project WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project;
SELECT task_name, duration FROM Task ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(task_id) AS task_count FROM Task GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_name, task_name, duration FROM Project p JOIN Task t ON p.project_id = t.project_id;
SELECT p.project_name, t.task_name, d.dependent_project_id FROM Project p JOIN Task t ON p.project_id = t.project_id JOIN Dependency d ON p.project_id = d.project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, sequence_id FROM task_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT path_id, task_id, duration FROM critical_paths WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT project_id, task_id FROM project_workflows WHERE workflow_id = 2;
SELECT timeline_id, project_id, date FROM project_timelines WHERE date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_dependencies WHERE project_id = 1 AND dependency_id = 2;
SELECT project_id, dependency_id FROM project_dependencies ORDER BY project_id ASC, dependency_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(dependency_id) AS num_dependencies FROM project_dependencies GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_timelines WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, SUM(duration) AS total_duration FROM critical_paths GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_duration > 10;
